description: Try our easy to follow Candy Cane Cupcakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cupcake,Seafood free,Christmas,Soy free,Tree nut free,Christmas leftovers,Leftovers,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Peanut free
name: Candy Cane Cupcakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g butter, softened (save 125g butter softened, for frosting)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a 12-hole medium muffin tray with paper cases.

Beat butter, sugar and vanilla together with electric beaters until pale and creamy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well between each. Fold in flour and milk, alternately, until combined. Divide batter evenly among cases. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden. Cool fully.
To make the frosting, beat butter until smooth and creamy. Gradually beat in icing sugar. Stir in milk.
Spread frosting on cupcakes. Sprinkle with crushed candy canes. Serve.
